synopsis.native: Au même moment en France, un couple de retraités surendettés tente de remporter un concours de rock, un ministre est soupçonné de fraude fiscale, une jeune adolescente rencontre un détraqué sexuel. Une longue nuit va commencer. Les chiens sont lâchés.
synopsis.english: Simultaneously, a retired couple overwhelmed by debt tries to win a dance contest, as the minister of economy is suspected of tax evasion, and a teenage girl encounters a sexual maniac, while a young lawyer attempts to climb the social ladder. When the shoe drops, the winner won’t necessarily be the one we expected.
